summary: This save will start you just outside the cave after the opening sequence, avoiding the monotonous beginning.
descriptionHtml:
As much as everybody loves and enjoys enduring and fighting their way through the opening sequence, I am not one of those people. I tried a couple of these and they started me at the beginning right after the wagon ride and I prefer to skip the whole opening completely. If you are anything like me, this is for you. 

It\'ll start you out as a dark elf but you can easily change this as you should know. But for those who aren\'t aware just use the tilde (`) or (~) key on you\'re keyboard, mine is located in the upper left but this may be different for you. Then type in \"showracemenu\" and hit enter and the character creation menu will pop up and voila.

Installation: 
This is not a mod it is simply just a save file, you cannot install with NMM.

Download and extract manually to what is (USUALLYALMOSTALWAYS) this path.
(Computer > Local Disk (C:) > Users > [YOUR ACCOUNT NAME] > My Documents > My Games > Skyrim > Saves)

Start Skyrim

Load quicker start

You iz done dawg
author: Tempahs
